title: That One Night in Vegas
description: It was supposed to be one wild night in Vegas, but when morning dawns, Adalynn’s and Cassie’s worlds are shattered to the core.A wealthy widow, Adalynn Arnaud, is the protector of her famed husband’s legacy. He saved her. She owes him. Even if that means hiding her passions in favor of life in a golden cage.Cut-off from her criminal family, Cassia Salvatore finds herself at the bottom of the barrel: completely broke and doing the very thing she’d always promised herself she wouldn’t do – escorting. Lost and incredibly lonely, she seeks a way out.When their fates collide on that one wild night in Vegas, the two women are thrown into the turmoil of their true desires. Adalynn is taken by Cassia’s otherworldly beauty and her lovely naive personality. And Cassia is stunned by the breathtaking raven-haired Goddess with a fierce spirit.At dawn, the two split ways, feeling trapped and lonelier than ever.Will Adalynn and Cassia go on with their miserable lives hiding their true passions? Or will they gather the courage to fight for their love and their choices?
author: Alexa  Woods
